eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl

Class LocalDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.LocalDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvanceDataStore, AdvanceDataStoreUpdate, XSerializable

    public class LocalDataStore
extends Object
implements XSerializable, AdvanceDataStore
    The local realm object containing various tables.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.09.21.
